detailsData.title: Results Driven Trial Attorneys
detailsData.content: Committed to putting clients first and achieving their goals.

detailsData.title: Trusted Referrals
detailsData.content: Clients are referred by other attorneys and past clients.

detailsData.title: Experienced Representation
detailsData.content: Over 20 years of high-stakes litigation experience.

valueProp: Moore Ruddell is a Los Angeles-based civil litigation firm that provides dynamic, high-quality counsel and representation to individual and business clients across the State of California. Our uncompromising and rigorous advocacy focuses on achieving our clients’ goals and protecting our clients’ interests.

testimonalData.text: Howard is everything you would want in an attorney. He's reasonable and even keeled but can be assertive and a zealous advocate when required.
testimonalData.author: Matthew P.

testimonalData.text: What a professional firm. Friendly and honest...and really fight for you.
testimonalData.author: Tami S.

testimonalData.text: Bonita was incredible I can’t say enough good things about her she made me feel so confident going into court.
testimonalData.author: Nick L.
